item.title: How to get better results with ImageMagick and convert
item.description: In last two days Iâ€™m trying to find best way to convert PDF files to good quality JPEG files. Of course size does matter, not only in case of women breasts. When I was trying to convert files directly from PDF to JPEG results was pretty scary: convert myfile.pdf[1] dc.jpg number 1 in brackets means only one(second) page to process. As I result I get file with pretty huge size: 496.
